analyzed: dhamma anuloma paccanīya tika duka paṭṭhāna pāḷi
sa ni dassana ttika pariyāpanna duka

original: Anidassanaappaṭighaṁ pariyāpannaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā nasanidassanasappaṭigho napariyāpanno dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
analyzed: anidassana appaṭigham pariyāpannam dhammam paccayā na sa nidassana sappaṭighaḥ na pariyāpannaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta hetuyā tīṇi pe avigate tīṇi

original: Anidassanaappaṭighaṁ apariyāpannaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naanidassanaappaṭigho naapariyāpanno
analyzed: anidassana appaṭigham apariyāpannam dhammam paṭicca na anidassana appaṭighaḥ na apariyāpannaḥ

original: dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Anidassanaappaṭighaṁ apariyāpannaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca
analyzed: dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā anidassana appaṭigham apariyāpannam dhammam paṭicca

original: nasanidassanasappaṭigho naapariyāpanno dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā …pe… anidassanaappaṭighaṁ
analyzed: na sanidassana sappaṭighaḥ na apariyāpannaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā pe anidassana appaṭigha

original: apariyāpannaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasanidassanasappaṭigho naapariyāpanno ca naanidassanasappaṭigho
analyzed: apariyāpannam dhammam paṭicca na sa nidassana sa paṭighaḥ na apariyāpannaḥ ca na anidassana sa paṭighaḥ

original: naapariyāpanno ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā cha, adhipatiyā
analyzed: na apariyāpanno ca dhammā uppajjanti hetu paccayā saṅkhitta hetuyā cha adhipatiyā
